summary: The diff adds a "Learn more about us" button to the homepage About/Firm Overview block and wires it to SPA navigation to "/about" with focus-visible styling. Two ancillary files were also modified (project metadata/summaries) that were not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project tracking/metadata file (project_state.json) marking new feature requests as pending.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked for a frontend UI/navigation change; updating internal project state metadata was not requested.
BuildRequest did not ask to modify documentation/index files; only the About section component change was required.
